data.text: Sɛnea nwansena funu ma aduhuam yi nka bɔne no,
Onyansafo koma sian kɔ nifa,
Mpo sɛ ɔkwasea nam ɔkwan so a,
Sɛ sodifo bo fuw wo a,
Bɔne bi wɔ hɔ a mahu wɔ owia yi ase
Wɔma nkwaseafo dibea a ɛkorɔn,
Mahu nkoa sɛ wɔtete apɔnkɔ so,
Obiara a otu amoa no betumi atɔ mu;
Obiara a ɔpae abo no, abo no betumi apira no;
Sɛ abonnua ano kum
Sɛ ɔwɔ ka obi ansa na wɔadwudwo no a
Onyansafo anom nsɛm yɛ nyam,
Mfiase no, wɔn nsɛm yɛ nkwaseasɛm;
na ɔkwasea woro nsɛm.
Ɔkwasea adwumayɛ ma ɔbrɛ;
Nnome nka wo, asase a na wo hene yɛ ɔsomfo
Nhyira nka wo, asase a wo hene yɛ ɔdehye
Sɛ obi yɛ akwadworɔ a ne mpuran yɛ mmerɛw;
Wɔto pon ma serew,
Wʼadwene mu mpo nkasa ntia ɔhene,
